title: Border, 1835–75
medium: Block-printed and flocked on machine-made paper
description:
Realistically modelled band of assorted, multi-colored flowers and flocked foliage runs down the center of this border. Stripes of flocking on the edges. Printed in yellow, blue, pink, greens and gray on a white satin ground.

H# 553

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1835–75.
1835–75. Block-printed and flocked on machine-made paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-90-a,b.
